p.name: Army and Navy Hospital, Hot Springs (Ark.)

bibl.title: Postcard from Gustaf E. Lambert to Albert E. Truby, July 14, 1941

div1.p: Lambert writes that he has been recuperating at the Army Hospital in Hot Springs, Arkansas, and thanks Truby for his help.

div1.head: Postcard from Gustaf E. Lambert to Albert E. Truby, July 14, 1941

GENUINE CURTEICH-CHICAGO “C.T. ART-COLORTONE” POST CARD (REG. U.S. PAT. OFF.)
Dear Sir
div1.p:
Have been here three
weeks and feel a lot
better by the end of this
week will be a new man.
Thank you for advice
I wrot Washington for,
and received per-
mission to go here
got an answer in three
days
div1.closer: Very Respectfully Lambert WOODCOCK MFG., HOT SPRINGS NATIONAL PARK, ARK.
